alert.note: Alert for Darke (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 13 at 7:03PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...SNOW SHOWERS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SHELBY, NORTHWESTERN LOGAN, NORTHEASTERN DARKE, CENTRAL AUGLAIZE, SOUTHEASTERN MERCER AND NORTHWESTERN MIAMI COUNTIES THROUGH 800 PM EST... At 702 PM EST, snow showers were located along a line extending from near Wapakoneta to near St. Henry, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Rapidly changing visibility and up to half an inch of snow accumulation. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Driving conditions may change quickly. Slick roads are possible. Locations impacted include... Sidney, Wapakoneta, New Bremen, Minster, Versailles, Newport, Anna, Fort Loramie, Jackson Center, Russells Point, Botkins, Lakeview, New Knoxville, Hardin, Moulton, Webster, Russia, Gettysburg, Osgood and Chickasaw. This includes I-75 in Ohio between mile markers 93 and 117.
info.instruction: Exercise extra caution while traveling. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
